text: To what key did you redefine screen command key
I'm using gnu screen in terminal and I'm quite happy with it.
The only thing is that I don't like the default command key binding ctrl+a.
I used it from the very beginning but now I understand that I would like to change it to something more comfortable for my hands.
There is no problem to change the hotkey, but I have a doubt what key to choose.
Please write down the key you have chosen to use as a command key in screen.
